name: Ex Driving Construct Machine19
description:
Ex Driving Construct Machine 19 is the most popular heavy excavators simulator. Control a heavy caterpillar excavator, construct buildings, lift & load crates, dig soil, fill dump trucks with sand, transport construction materials with hydraulic crane, and much more.
Features:
- 3D graphics
- Real life Terrain experience
- Easy to control with your fingers and touch
- Drive excavator crane like a Pro.
- Multiple Construction Vehicles
- Drive, Dig, Transport and More.
